DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study assess effect Quality Life two cycle Dysport treatment post-stroke spasticity upper limb . The effect treatment spasticity function also measure .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Quality Life Following Dysport Treatment Post-Stroke Spasticity Arm
DOC.criteria: The patient suffer stroke , define World Health Organisation ( WHO ) criterion , least 6 month previously . The patient hemiparetic arm meet minimum score requirement Modified Ashworth Scale . The patient cognitive communication ability participate study . Patients receive botulinum toxin treatment within past 120 day . Contraindication botulinum toxin treatment . Patients receive oral antispasticity medication change dosage medication month prior study entry . Patients previously treat phenol upper limb spasticity .
